page.title: 16FAMILY LIFE
page.content: In our family my brother has to get up at 7:00 in the morning and gets dressed.He goes down the stairs and has his breakfast.Then he sits down in the armchair and watchs T.V. He has to catch the bus at 8:00 so he goes down to the square at 7:50 , then he will be in time to catch the bus.I get up at 8:00 get dressed and go down stairs to have my breakfast.When I have had my breakfast I have to take the dog for a walk.That takes quarter of an hour so I'm just in time for school. On Saturdays and Sundays we usually get up about 10am and have our breakfast at 10:30.For the rest of the day we usually find something to do or we go out to play.
